instruction.title: Color
instruction.text: In the text, VIEW shows you the Russian adjectives.

instruction.title: Click
instruction.text: Click on each Russian adjective you find in the text and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong.

instruction.title: Multiple Choice
instruction.text: Choose a Russian adjective from the drop-down list and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong. You can get help by clicking on ?.

instruction.title: Fill in the blanks
instruction.text: Fill in the blanks with the correct Russian adjective. If you guessed wrong or you find it too difficult you can get help by clicking on ?.
